name: part_008
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Otonose Kanade performs a cover of 'Betelgeuse'.
Performance of 'Acacia' featuring Oozora Subaru and Shirogane Noel.

subtitles.original: 愛に寄り添ってる
subtitles.english: Living close to love,

subtitles.original: それを泣いたり笑ったり繋いでいく
subtitles.english: Connecting it all through tears and laughter.

subtitles.original: 何十回何百回ぶつかりあって
subtitles.english: Clashing tens, hundreds of times,

subtitles.original: 何十年何百年昔の光が
subtitles.english: The light from tens, hundreds of years ago,

subtitles.original: 僕自身も忘れたころに
subtitles.english: Just as I had forgotten about it,

subtitles.original: 僕らに届いてる
subtitles.english: Has reached us.

subtitles.original: 僕ら見つめ合って 手繰り合って同じ空
subtitles.english: Gazing at each other, drawing closer under the same sky,

subtitles.original: 輝くのだって二人だって約束した
subtitles.english: We promised that we'd shine together, just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: In the far distance, the never-ending Betelgeuse,

subtitles.original: 誰かに繋ぐ魔法
subtitles.english: A magic that connects us to someone.

subtitles.original: 僕ら肩並べて 取り合って進んでく
subtitles.english: Walking side-by-side, holding hands as we go,

subtitles.original: 辛い時だって泣かないって誓っただろ
subtitles.english: We swore we wouldn't cry even in hard times, didn't we?

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: In the far distance, the never-ending Betelgeuse,

subtitles.original: 君にも見えるだろう
subtitles.english: You can see it too, can't you?

subtitles.original: 祈りが
subtitles.english: Our prayer.

subtitles.original: 記憶を辿るたび 蘇るよ
subtitles.english: Every time I trace my memories, it comes back to me,

subtitles.original: 君がいつだってそこにいてくれること
subtitles.english: That you are always there for me.

subtitles.original: まるでそれは星の光と同じように
subtitles.english: It's just like the starlight,

subtitles.original: 今日を泣いたり笑ったり繋いでいく
subtitles.english: Connecting today through tears and laughter.

subtitles.original: 何十回何百回ぶつかりあって
subtitles.english: Clashing tens, hundreds of times,

subtitles.original: 何十年何百年昔の光が
subtitles.english: The light from tens, hundreds of years ago,

subtitles.original: 僕自身も忘れたころに
subtitles.english: Just as I had forgotten about it,

subtitles.original: 僕らの照らしてる
subtitles.english: Is shining upon us.

subtitles.original: 僕ら見つめ合って 手繰り合って同じ空
subtitles.english: Gazing at each other, drawing closer under the same sky,

subtitles.original: 輝くのだって二人だって約束した
subtitles.english: We promised that we'd shine together, just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: In the far distance, the never-ending Betelgeuse,

subtitles.original: 誰かに繋ぐ魔法
subtitles.english: A magic that connects us to someone.

subtitles.original: どこまでいつまで生きられるか
subtitles.english: How far, and for how long can we live?

subtitles.original: 君が不安になるたびに強がるんだ
subtitles.english: Every time you get anxious, I'll act tough.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫僕が横にいるよ
subtitles.english: It's okay, I'm right here by your side.

subtitles.original: 見えない線を繋ごう
subtitles.english: Let's connect an invisible line.

subtitles.original: 僕ら見つめ合って 手繰り合って同じ空
subtitles.english: Gazing at each other, drawing closer under the same sky,

subtitles.original: 輝くのだって二人だって約束した
subtitles.english: We promised that we'd shine together, just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: In the far distance, the never-ending Betelgeuse,

subtitles.original: 誰かに繋ぐ魔法
subtitles.english: A magic that connects us to someone.

subtitles.original: 僕ら肩並べて 取り合って進んでく
subtitles.english: Walking side-by-side, holding hands as we go,

subtitles.original: 辛い時だって泣かないって誓っただろ
subtitles.english: We swore we wouldn't cry even in hard times, didn't we?

subtitles.original: 遥か遠く終わらないベテルギウス
subtitles.english: In the far distance, the never-ending Betelgeuse,

subtitles.original: 君にも見えるだろう
subtitles.english: You can see it too, can't you?

subtitles.original: 祈りが
subtitles.english: Our prayer.

subtitles.original: 空にある何かを見つめてたら
subtitles.english: As I was gazing at something in the sky,

subtitles.original: それは星だって君が教えてくれた
subtitles.english: You told me that those were stars.

subtitles.original: アカシア
subtitles.english: Acacia

subtitles.original: 透明よりも綺麗なあの輝きを確かめに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go and witness that radiance, clearer than transparency.

subtitles.original: そうやって始まったんだよ たまに忘れるほど強い理由
subtitles.english: That's how it all started, with a reason so strong I sometimes forget it.

subtitles.original: 冷たい雨に濡れる時は足音比べ騒ぎながら行こう
subtitles.english: When we get soaked in the cold rain, let's make some noise and compare our footsteps as we go.

subtitles.original: 太陽の代わりに歌を 君と僕と世界の声で
subtitles.english: Let's sing instead of the sun, with your voice, mine, and the voice of the world.

subtitles.original: いつか君を見つけた時に 君に僕も見つけてもらったんだな
subtitles.english: The moment I found you, you found me too, didn't you?

subtitles.original: 今目が合えば笑うだけさ 言葉の外側で
subtitles.english: Now if our eyes meet, we'll just laugh, beyond the realm of words.
